com.lowagie.tools

Class EncryptPdf

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.tools.EncryptPdf

  • public class EncryptPdf
extends Object
    Encrypts a PDF document. It needs iText (http://www.lowagie.com/iText).
    Since:
    2.1.1 (renamed to follow Java naming conventions)
    Author:
    Paulo Soares (psoares@consiste.pt)
